Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX 150 Digital 14.1 MP Camera
Reviews.Author: Leon J. Nunez
Reviews.Content: I recently received the Canon PowerShot SX 150 and so far I have been impressed with all the photos I have taken.  The 12 X wide angle Optical lens does anexcellent job on the photos I have taken.  The price I paid for this camera was appropriate.  The camera was delivered on time. The camera was sold with extraaccessories , memory card, carrying case and cleaning kit.  This is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Slow action
Reviews.Author: Richard Krell
Reviews.Content: Over all not a bad camera, the problem is when you need a flash. You have to open the flash by pulling it up and then wait for it to charge. This can take some time and you have to wait after each photo for the flash before taking another photo.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Allen
Reviews.Content: I was a professional photographer for 20 years, using much larger cameras.  Retired now, wanted something small to carry on trips, but didn't want to sacrifice features.  This camera has it!!  It will do a lot more and takes better pictures than my old Canon SLR.  I'm still discovering some of the things this camera will do.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera!
Reviews.Author: TES
Reviews.Content: I'm no expert, Ive owned a few digital cameras but that's it so I don't know all the technical mumbo jumbo? I bought this to go to Maui, took it out of the box, put batteries in it, set to auto and start clicking. Worked great, I think the pictures were crisp, clear and overall were wonderful. I can say a few people I know that do know all the mumbo jumbo looked at our pictures and said "wow! what kind of camera do you have, these are great!" Whatever? I just took pictures, the camera did all the work.I'm kinda a nerd so I played with the different settings, does all kinds of stuff and its not hard to navigate the menu, kinda dumb guy proof. Works for me. If you can program a DVR you'll do just fine.It comes with a good case, memory card and cleaning kit. BONUS!

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: purchased this camera for a cruise I was taking.  This camera takes great pictures.  I wish I could post the pictures especially the ones I took zooming in.  I don't think you'll find a camera this good for a price under $200.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Edward Flanagan
Reviews.Content: I have used this on many trips to document the places I have been.  Compared photo's with friends who have Nikon's and more expensive canon camera's and they agree that my photo's are just as visual as theirs.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot SX160 IS 16 MP
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is a VERY good camara. I recommend to buy this camara if anyone wants to take really good picture's this is the camara to buy :)

Reviews.Title: Still figureing it out, but great camera
Reviews.Author: Searcher
Reviews.Content: Having to buy my first digital camera was a little scary, but I have found this one to be a winner even with people who know digital cameras from using others. Great picture quality, awesome features, great price. The only thing I did not like about this package deal was the carrying case, it is good for storing the camera at home, but I will have to buy another case for travel, I prefer one with pockets and a better ability to secure the camera inside, in case of unexpected movements or trips, the price was the same with package deal or not so I took a chance, not unhappy with having the memory disk, made getting to know the camera easier sense it would not have come with one otherwise. Comes with batteries, I am not sure yet if this a good thing or not, some say it is not, but could not find out another way to go, for the most part I am happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy To Use - Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: This is the second camera like this I purchased.  My niece was so impressed with it, I gaveher mine and purchased another....my other one was 12x zoom, this one 16x.  They bothtake terrific pictures...really, color, clarity, etc.  Why I also purchased this is because it uses2 AA batteries.  These batteries last a long time.....love the fact that you don't have to recharge,so if you are anywhere out of town or about, you always have a running camera.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: J. E. Woodsum
Reviews.Content: Takes awesome pics!! great action shots I got the best dolphin shots from a moving boat in Florida! I truly love it!!

Reviews.Title: cannon powershot
Reviews.Author: Cleta Gibson
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and takes clear, bright pictures. The flash works well. I will be enjoying it for years

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: butler
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Canon powershot with the clarity of the pictures and the zoom, my daughter has the 120 and it has been a really nice camera for the money. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: bonnie cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip this fall to ireland and so far I love it simple to use and get started with package comes with everything you need to start taking pictures and for the price very very nice.  delivery was quick

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: PeggyK
Reviews.Content: I specifically requested the Canon Powershot  SX150 for my birthday & this camera delivers ALL I need!!! Plus it's red instead of plain black

Reviews.Title: Love it! Pics are great!
Reviews.Author: debmc
Reviews.Content: Love it! The red color is gorgeous. It is light weight and easy to handle. I haven't had any printed yet to check the color, pixels or clarity yet.

Reviews.Title: CANON POWERSHOT SX150 CAMERA
Reviews.Author: L. CASSTEVENS "LUKYSTAR"
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA! LOTS OF EXTRAS! USER FRIENDLY! LOVE THE RED COLOR. RECOMMENDED TO ME BY A SEMI-PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHER. MY DAUGHTER ALSO BOUGHT THIS SAME CAMERA AND SHE LOVES IT TOO!

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX160 IS 16MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch LCD (Red) Deluxe Bundle With 8 GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case, Cleaning Kit
